text: Frederick Hill (17 January 1940 â€“ 1 October 2021) was an English footballer who played at both professional and international levels as an inside forward. He played for Halifax Town, Manchester City and Peterborough United, making over 500 appearances in the Football League. Hill played for the England national team in 1962. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield
title: Fred Hill (footballer, born 1940)
